name: Christmas Storybook Essential Oil Perfume Set
description:
The Night Before Christmas was one of my favorite Christmas stories growing up - and I still love it. It's a classic, and everyone knows the verses...some of us by heart! I wanted to make a perfume set to celebrate this great story, and after many months of trial and error, I have 3 scents based on text from the story that are very unique - Sugar Plum Visions, New Fallen Snow and Ashes and Soot.

Sugar Plum Visions is just as sweet as it sounds (and tastes). Copaiba balsam, fig, plum and almond are in a jojoba oil base, and they smell good enough to eat (but don't, please).

New Fallen Snow features patchouli, clary sage, cornmint, siberian fir, balsam gurjun and peppermint in a jojoba oil base, and it's delightfully refreshing.

Ashes & Soot contains petitgrain, cade, muhuhu, vetiver, vanilla and tobacco diluted with jojoba oil, and it's my favorite. It smells just like a cold fireplace.

You get all 3 in this set, but don't wait - it's only offered in November and December!

++++++++++++

This is my full size roll on - 1/6 oz. It's the perfect size to toss into your purse or slip into your pocket. I do not use the 1/3 oz because - if you're like me and love perfume - you end up with a handful, and then it takes forever to use them up. I use glass vials and bottles for all of my blends, so you don't have to worry about the toxins that leach from plastic.

These roll ons are shipped in tiny boxes and then carefully wrapped in black tissue paper before being mailed in padded envelopes.

++++++++++++

Want to use the scent for something other than perfume? Try putting some on a small piece of cloth and placing in the dryer, adding to a scent ring for light bulbs, freshening old potpourri or saturating a cotton ball and placing randomly in your home. And that's just to start!

++++++++++++

I use a mixture of essential oils, flavor oils, CO2s and macerations. No synthetic fragrances, nature identicals, solvents or alcohols have been used to produce any of the oils, and all sources are natural or organic. I started these blends because I had been researching perfumes for my health blog, and I just couldn't believe what I was finding as far as ingredients in regular perfumes and so-called natural/organic ones. I am very picky and selective about what I use for these, and I want them to be as natural as possible.

Essential oil prices are quite fickle, as you know, so the price of each blend is based on the cost of my current stock. The prices of the samples and 1/6 oz vials are subject to change based on future market prices.

** Keep in mind that just because the oils are essential or natural doesn’t mean you won’t have an allergic reaction if you’re prone to such – always try on a small area of skin first. Oils are toxic if taken internally, & you should avoid if you’re pregnant. Always keep oil blends away from children, pets & flammable objects. **

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Make sure to FAVORITE my shop because I offer monthly specials and coupon codes! And ALWAYS check my shop announcement on the main page before making your purchase to see if there is a coupon code available!

With every order from my shop, you'll receive a free magnet and scent card that features one of my herbal oil infusions plus a small flyer that tells you a little about me (and don't forget to use the coupon code mentioned in the flyer towards your next order).

Your satisfaction is VERY important to me. If you ever have a problem with an item, please let me know, and I will get back to you as quickly as I can. Customer satisfaction is top priority!

I LOVE doing custom orders! Got a suggestion or idea? Let me know!

+++++++++++

Any holders and/or props are only for display purposes and do not come with item listed.

All herbal oil blend names and the digital designs on my items are copyright Psychedelic Snowflake.

name: Gingerbread Kisses Essential Oil Perfume
description:
Nothing smells 'like Christmas' quite like the sweet scent of gingerbread cookies baking in the oven!

With vanilla, almond, nutmeg, cinnamon, clove, ginger and just a dash of chocolate in jojoba oil, you'll want to eat this blend it smells so good (but please don't).

++++++++++++

This is my full size roll on - 1/6 oz. It's the perfect size to toss into your purse or slip into your pocket. name: Peppermint Ice Essential Oil Perfume
description:
Peppermint is a favorite scent of mine all year, but even more so at Christmas! And with three different kinds of mint in this blend, you'll think you're in mint heaven!

Peppermint, eucalyptus radiata, cornmint, elemi, ylang ylang and spearmint are in a jojoba base - everyone will love this cool, crisp scent!

++++++++++++

name: Harry Potter - Severus Snape Bow
description:
Do you have that *perfect* Harry Potter gift for someone? Top the package with the *perfect* bow!

You won't find this in any store! It's handmade - no two are identical!

Bow arrives safely packed in a small shipping box.

I will be making other characters, as well, or feel free to send a request. I can personalize these with YOUR pictures, too! (Think - wedding, kids, pets, anniversary, birthday, etc!)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

name: Today I Feel Magnetic Board - Harry Potter Style PG Version
description:
Are you looking for something truly unique either for you or for a gift for someone else? You will not find another Today I Feel board in this Harry Potter style anywhere! I added this second version because many parents are uncomfortable buying the original version (with the word 'bitchy' on it), so this provides a PG alternative.

The board measures 4 3/4" x 7 3/4", and it has a completely magnetic back suitable for any metal surface. The pointer is 1 1/8" x 2 1/2", and it has a round magnetic disk on the back that allows it to be moved around easily to display your 'mood' for the day.

Would you love to see another fandom in this style? Let me know!

Board & pointer are shipped in a stay flat or padded envelope and arrive carefully wrapped in black tissue paper.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

What others are saying -

"This product is so different; definitely not something you find often. I think it's witty and fun."

"This is for my daughter who has autism/aspergers. She loves HP. It will be a fun way to help with understanding emotions/facial expressions."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
